languages.text: "Если тебе так не нравятся ксеносы, то ты волен уйти в любой момент".

traits.locale_text: "Если тебе так не нравятся ксеносы, то ты волен уйти в любой момент".

languages.text: "If you are nursing such a grudge against xenos, you are free to leave whenever you wish."
languages.original_text: "Если тебе так не нравятся ксеносы, то ты волен уйти в любой момент".

languages.text: 「もしあなたが異種族を恨んでいるのなら、いつでも帰ってもらって構わないんだぞ」
languages.original_text: "If you are nursing such a grudge against xenos, you are free to leave whenever you wish."

traits.locale_text: 「もしあなたが異種族を恨んでいるのなら、いつでも帰ってもらって構わないんだぞ」

languages.text: “如果你这么看不惯异形的话，你可以随时一走了之。”
languages.original_text: "If you are nursing such a grudge against xenos, you are free to leave whenever you wish."

traits.locale_text: “如果你这么看不惯异形的话，你可以随时一走了之。”

languages.text: «Si guarda tanto rencor contra los xenos, es libre de marcharse cuando quiera».
languages.original_text: "If you are nursing such a grudge against xenos, you are free to leave whenever you wish."

traits.locale_text: «Si guarda tanto rencor a los xenos, es libre de marcharse cuando quiera».

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr einen solchen Groll gegen Xenos hegt, dürft Ihr jederzeit gerne gehen."
languages.original_text: "If you are nursing such a grudge against xenos, you are free to leave whenever you wish."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr einen solchen Groll gegen die Xenos hegt, dürft Ihr jederzeit gerne gehen."

languages.text: « Si vous haïssez tant les xénos, vous êtes libre de partir quand bon vous semble. »
languages.original_text: "If you are nursing such a grudge against xenos, you are free to leave whenever you wish."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous haïssez tant les xénos, vous êtes libre de partir quand bon vous semble. »

languages.text: "Zenolara karşı böylesine bir kin besliyorsan dilediğin zaman ayrılmakta serbestsin."
languages.original_text: "If you are nursing such a grudge against xenos, you are free to leave whenever you wish."

traits.locale_text: "Zenolara karşı böylesine bir kin besliyorsan dilediğin zaman ayrılmakta serbestsin."
